name: Baby DJ
description:
Baby DJ is a fun educational music game for kids and their parents.

— Bright, fun and user-friendly beatbox interface for beginner DJ
— 22 children's songs in our own 9-track format
— Vinyl mode and scratch
— Original loops and beats sync system
— Track Volume Control System on the iPad
— Record your own mixes

All music in the app is created specially for Baby DJ by Sergei Pimenov (PPK) and Agent Smith, the famous music producers from Russia.

Official website — http://babydj.ru

Press and our users' reviews::

If you are looking for a fun music app for your little ones, you should definitely check out Baby DJ! I really thought it was a fun app and that kids would love it. The best part is – you can try it out for free!

— TheIphoneMom.com

Baby DJ is a unique app which brings music, mixing, scratching, sampling, and “DJ-ing” to kids and parents. With its visually appealing and intuitive interface, children and adults will definitely have a good time combining, experimenting, and playing with the songs and samples.

— IheartThisApp.com

This app is easy to use and one that you should check out. 5 / 5 stars

— KidsBestIpadApps.com

Sin duda, una aplicación con la que los más pequeños podrán tener diversión garantizada durante mucho tiempo, tanto en el iPhone, el iPod Touch o el iPad.

— TodoIphone.com

Ultra consigliata.

— GguidaIpad.net

Kapulanif — "From infants to adults this is great! - Awesome & addictive app!"

PhillipJ.Fry — "Amazing - I download a lot of apps for review, time burning, and OCD, and this is, hands down, the BEST free kids app I have seen to date.My 2 year old LOVES it even more than Peekaboo Farm. Five stars!!"

Speedygomes — "Very Smart Trainer - Asha is 18 mths old and just loves this. In just a few weeks I can see the changes in her ability to recognise different sounds and she now experiments wildly with putting them together."

Renske84 — "This is so cool! - Even for adults this is very fun!"

DJMia — "BabyDJ Rules! - I got this app for my daughter, and I find myself playing with it the most!There are 9 sounds per track, and it is up to you to choose which ones play and when, thereby creating music from the 9 preselected sound clips. There are a bunch of different songs for free, just download. There's others to purchase if you want.You can record your creations and even email them to people. Pretty cool!I connect my iPad to my stereo system through a 3.5mm plug out from the headphone jack, and I can create music of my own at high volume. My daughter seems to like the techno beats the best, and I prefer making funk music. Totally cool app! Best of the 70 or so apps I have on the iPad so far."

Woeisrose — "great fun! - The whole family likes to play with this."

Majandess — "So Much Fun! - I bought this for my three year old son to play with, but everyone in the family loves to play! The music is catchy, the interface is simple, and making your own mixes can occupy you for hours. Thank you!!"

Kathtea — "Fantastic. - The description says kids' songs but they are a pleasure to listen to - i.e. never annoying. It's a brilliant and simple introduction to arrangement and the layers of music. My little one adores this app; he loves composing and playing and I love hearing the tunes. My only (little) criticism is that two of the tunes are almost identical..."

margaret pomeroy — "Baby dj - It's fun
